ps2vfs.plugin
Interface VfsPlugin

public interface VfsPlugin

Method Summary

          Show about information for the plugin.

          This is method is called so the plugin can change or add to the directory listing.

Method Detail

init

public boolean init(java.util.logging.Logger log)
Initializes the plugin. It will be disabled if false is returned. param Logger should be used to add log messages.

doAbout

public void doAbout(boolean guiEnabled)
Show about information for the plugin. If guiEnabled is set the plugin can use GUI classes.

doConfigure

public void doConfigure(boolean guiEnabled)

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
The plugin should return a short name.

getDescription

public java.lang.String getDescription()
The plugin should return a short description of itself

getProtocol

public java.lang.String getProtocol()
The plugin should return the name of the protocol it supports. If it is a pure filter plugin, null should be returned.

filterDir

public void filterDir(VfsDir dir)
This is method is called so the plugin can change or add to the directory listing.

readDir

public java.util.List readDir(java.lang.String path)
The plugin can overload the reading of a directory. Objects in the list should implement the VfsDirEntry interface!

open

public VfsOpenFile open(java.lang.String path)
This method is called so the plugin can overload the open method.
